    • Method Detail

      • splitParcels

        public static org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection splitParcels​(org.opengis.feature.simple.SimpleFeature toSplit,
                                                                            double maximalArea,
                                                                            double maximalWidth,
                                                                            double harmonyCoeff,
                                                                            double noise,
                                                                            java.util.List<org.locationtech.jts.geom.LineString> extBlock,
                                                                            double streetWidth,
                                                                            boolean forceStreetAccess,
                                                                            int decompositionLevelWithoutStreet)
                                                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Split the parcels into sub parcels. The parcel that are going to be cut must have a field matching the MarkParcelAttributeFromPosition.getMarkFieldName() field or "SPLIT" by default with the value of 1. Overload to split a single parcel.
        Parameters:
        toSplit - SimpleFeatureCollection of parcels
        maximalArea - Area of the parcel under which the parcel won't be anymore cut
        maximalWidth - Width of the parcel under which the parcel won't be anymore cut
        harmonyCoeff - intensity of the forcing of a parcel to be connected with a road
        extBlock - outside of the parcels (representing road or public space)
        streetWidth - With of the street composing the street network
        decompositionLevelWithoutStreet - Number of last iteration row for which no street network is generated
        forceStreetAccess - Force the access to the road for each parcel. Not working good yet.
        Returns:
        a collection of subdivised parcels
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • splitParcel

      • splitParcels

        public static org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection splitParcels​(org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection toSplit,
                                                                            org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection roads,
                                                                            double maximalArea,
                                                                            double maximalWidth,
                                                                            double harmonyCoeff,
                                                                            double noise,
                                                                            java.util.List<org.locationtech.jts.geom.LineString> extBlock,
                                                                            double smallStreetWidth,
                                                                            int largeStreetLevel,
                                                                            double largeStreetWidth,
                                                                            boolean forceStreetAccess,
                                                                            int decompositionLevelWithoutStreet)
                                                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Split the parcels into sub parcels. The parcel that are going to be cut must have a field matching the MarkParcelAttributeFromPosition.getMarkFieldName() field or "SPLIT" by default with the value of 1.
        Parameters:
        toSplit - SimpleFeatureCollection of parcels
        roads - Road Shapefile (can be null)
        maximalArea - Area of the parcel under which the parcel won't be anymore cut
        maximalWidth - Width of the parcel under which the parcel won't be anymore cut
        harmonyCoeff - intensity of the forcing of a parcel to be connected with a road
        noise - irregularity into parcel shape
        extBlock - outside of the parcels (representing road or public space)
        smallStreetWidth -
        largeStreetLevel -
        largeStreetWidth -
        forceStreetAccess - Force the access to the road for each parcel. Not working good yet.
        decompositionLevelWithoutStreet - Number of last iteration row for which no street network is generated
        Returns:
        a collection of subdivised parcels
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • computeSplittingPolygon

        public static java.util.List<org.locationtech.jts.geom.Polygon> computeSplittingPolygon​(org.locationtech.jts.geom.Polygon pol,
                                                                                        java.util.List<org.locationtech.jts.geom.LineString> ext,
                                                                                        boolean shortDirectionSplit,
                                                                                        double epsilon,
                                                                                        double noise,
                                                                                        double smallRoadWidth,
                                                                                        int largeRoadLevel,
                                                                                        double largeRoadWidth,
                                                                                        int decompositionLevelWithRoad,
                                                                                        int decompositionLevel)
        Computed the splitting polygons composed by two boxes determined from the oriented bounding boxes split from a line at its middle.
        Parameters:
        pol - The input polygon
        shortDirectionSplit - It is split by the short edges or by the long edge.
        Returns:
        A list of split polygons
